name: Best Lentil Soup
ingredients: 1 tbs abodo seasoning (tumeric, oregano, salt, garlic, coriander, cumin, turmeric)
Veggies: Sweet potatoes, carrots, celery, onion, 2 red peppers, zucchini
steps: Saute meat, onion, adding garlic & ginger at the end until fragrant
Add remaining ingredients (ok to use dried beans)
bring to a boil and then simmer for 45 min
